message:
Hi Stephen,
I was just curious if this article still holds true to not use Task.Factory.StartNew? The reason for my question is that the current Microsoft documentation, located here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.threading.tasks.task-1?view=netframework-4.8 says that it is the most common way to do it;
"An alternative, and the most common way to start a task in the .NET Framework 4, is to call the static TaskFactory.StartNew..." (third paragraph in "Remarks" section). 

Thanks,
Jeff
